channel.description:

[SIZE=6]Links[/SIZE] [URL=http://"https://mega.co.nz/#!u1BAWJJZ!KwqbbkQH7aq6AOglOZ_ICEJSlqVdMj958RGV2ZWiVSA"]Download Client[/url] [URL=http://"http://runality.com/play/index.html"]Webclient[/URL] [url=http://runality.com/]Runailty - Forums[/url]
[SIZE=6]Information[/SIZE]
[b]Starting out in Runality you must create your account first.[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c1in8tL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/58MzyxG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZrbH5Sq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ilNSJ4d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0x0Jn9J.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ctdb5EF.jpg[/img]
[B][U]Note:[/U][/B] this still needs alot of work, if you find any bugs report them here or on the forums thanks.
[/CENTER]

item.title: Runality - RS3
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:549380”]Pretty basic server you have going on here, and the forums seem to be incomplete unless you have to be logged in to view the rest of the sections. I would honestly recommend getting that website done as soon as possible and seeing where you can take this from there.

I wish the best of luck with the server and forum nonetheless. Do you have any past big or somewhat big servers that people might have heard of? Your name seems rather familiar to me.[/quote]

Ive ran multiple servers in the past this is just a beta until the combat is fully complete, skills will be added day by day.

Read full topic

item.title: Runality - RS3
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Pretty basic server you have going on here, and the forums seem to be incomplete unless you have to be logged in to view the rest of the sections. I would honestly recommend getting that website done as soon as possible and seeing where you can take this from there.

I wish the best of luck with the server and forum nonetheless. Do you have any past big or somewhat big servers that people might have heard of? Your name seems rather familiar to me.

Read full topic
